definition: one of the four pointed conical teeth, two in each jaw, located between the incisors and the premolars; also known as canines
details:
noun
- one of the four pointed conical teeth, two in each jaw, located between the incisors and the premolars; also known as canines
= example: one of the four pointed conical teeth, two in each jaw, located between the incisors and the premolars; also known as canines
= synonyms: canine
